column4: hey I'm installing ubuntu 10 on my desktop. im trying to connect to the internet through a CNet 8-port switch. when I plug the computer directly into the wall the setup works but when i plug into the switch it doesn't find the connection. the same connection works on my windows machine
what does if config state?  does it show an odd ip address?
you might need a router, not a switch.. to allow for a single outbound ip..
